name: apodviewer
description: This is an MDL, Firebase app that uses NASA's APOD API

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/js/material.js src/js/moment-with-locales.js src/js/jquery.js src/js/firebase-app.js src/js/firebase-auth.js src/js/firebase-database.js src/js/main.js -c -o build/app.min.js

author: Benjamin H Boruff
